ai-patthana21.36:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.36:0.3_0: Taking the internal and external objects,
ai-patthana21.36:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching with internal objects, with no cause or condition for the sake of oneself.
ai-patthana21.36:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.36:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.36:3.1_0: there is no internal object in oneself,
